short.am,ar,bn,ca,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es,es_4: Prevent YouTube page, HTML5 player, and Flash player from displaying advertisements and banners
short.bg: Предотвратяване на показването на реклами и банери на страницата на YouTube, плейъра на HTML5 и плейъра на Flash
short.cs: Zabránit zobrazování reklam a bannerů na stránce YouTube, v přehrávači HTML5 a v přehrávači Flash.
short.da: Forhindrer YouTube-siden, HTML5-afspilleren og Flash-afspilleren i at vise reklamer og bannere
short.de: Verhindern, dass die YouTube-Seite, der HTML5-Player und der Flash-Player Werbung und Banner anzeigen
short.el: Αποτρέψτε τη σελίδα YouTube, το πρόγραμμα αναπαραγωγής HTML5 και το πρόγραμμα αναπαραγωγής Flash από την εμφάνιση διαφημίσεων και…
short.et: YouTube'i lehe, HTML5-mängija ja Flash-mängija reklaamide ja bännerite kuvamise takistamine
short.fi: Estä YouTube-sivua, HTML5-soitinta ja Flash-soitinta näyttämästä mainoksia ja bannereita.
short.fr: Empêcher la page YouTube, le lecteur HTML5 et le lecteur Flash d'afficher des publicités et des bannières.
short.hu: A YouTube-oldal, a HTML5-lejátszó és a Flash-lejátszó reklámok és bannerek megjelenítésének megakadályozása
short.it: Impedire che la pagina di YouTube, il lettore HTML5 e il lettore Flash mostrino pubblicità e banner
short.ja: YouTubeのページ、HTML5プレーヤー、Flashプレーヤーに広告やバナーが表示されないようにする。
short.nl: Voorkomen dat YouTube-pagina's, HTML5-spelers en Flash-spelers advertenties en banners weergeven
short.zh_CN: 防止YouTube页面、HTML5播放器和Flash播放器显示广告和标语

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a browser extension to remove banner and display ads from the YouTube website and embed advertisements from YouTube's HTML5 and Flash players. Please note that is not a general-purpose adblocker. This extension only removes advertisements on YouTube web pages.

Compare to an AdBlocker, this extension is very lightweight in terms of memory and resource usage. If you have a slow computer and you would like to ads to be gone, use this extension.

Technical notes:
The observer of this extension only works when you have at least one YT web page. Also, it only has two regular expression rules to improve the performance and prevent the observer from slow down your browser (compare it with hundreds of rules a general-purpose adblocker needs to install to operate).

Permissions Explained:
Although this extension only works on YT pages, it still requires all "hostnames" permission. This is a must-have since the origin of the advertisement could vary by your location (localized hostnames).
